about_the_game:
You are a true patriot of the Soviet Union! 6 exciting levels await you, where you will be confronted by a variety of opponents - bandits, liberals, corrupt police officers, and other enemies of the Land of the Soviets. Avoid numerous traps set by the fifth column on the path to a Bright Future. Collect bottles to stun enemies and defuse traps. On your way you will see many places close to the heart of every resident of the post-Soviet space - courtyards on the outskirts of the city, the ruins of abandoned factories, a cozy village landscape.

Return of the USSR is a 2.5D platformer that will not leave indifferent anyone who is familiar with the warm atmosphere of life in the countries of the former Soviet Union. So help us bring back our beloved Soviet Motherland!

highlighted.name: For the return of the USSR!

detailed_description:
You are a true patriot of the Soviet Union! 6 exciting levels await you, where you will be confronted by a variety of opponents - bandits, liberals, corrupt police officers, and other enemies of the Land of the Soviets. Avoid numerous traps set by the fifth column on the path to a Bright Future. Collect bottles to stun enemies and defuse traps. On your way you will see many places close to the heart of every resident of the post-Soviet space - courtyards on the outskirts of the city, the ruins of abandoned factories, a cozy village landscape.

Return of the USSR is a 2.5D platformer that will not leave indifferent anyone who is familiar with the warm atmosphere of life in the countries of the former Soviet Union. So help us bring back our beloved Soviet Motherland!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ventura 13.4
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 570
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ventura 13.6
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 570
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
